entry.title: Kingdom of Chimira
entry.summary:
Author: cry_silver

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,147Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 6

Summary: The war between Nemeton and Gévaudan has ended but with great cost. The now conquering King Theo has retruned from plundering the villages for fresh meat to serve the palace, and more importantly himself. Stiles was ripped away from his simple but content life in Beacon Hills to serve as Theo's most recent obession. Seeing how ruthless the man was during his last obession & the fall out from the resulting war - Stiles struggles to not only survive the the man but also protects the few friends he has within the castle. Which would admittedly be a lot easier if the god damn annoying engima of a man, Lord Hale did not have to go around looking like addonis rencarted.

entry.title: Where Ashes Lie
entry.summary:
Author: TendreChaos

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 94,774Chapters: 16/40Kudos: 93

Summary: Stiles has always known he was different, that there was something inside him people were afraid of.In a society where the supernatural is hunted and contained, sorcerers are stripped of their names, their freedom, and their humanity. After months of captivity behind concrete walls, Stiles manages to escape and disappears into the woods, where he finds a rebel group willing to take him in. But trust is fragile and Stiles carries a secret, a power he barely understands and cannot share.Because if they knew the truth, if they knew what Stiles really was... They wouldn’t hate the cage that once held him.They’d build a stronger one.

entry.title: Survivors
entry.summary:
Author: Nenufarluz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 126,933Chapters: 45/45Kudos: 230

Summary: The world fell into ruin in just a few days, overtaken by a virus that turned ordinary people into ravenous undead. Amid the chaos, Stiles, a college student in New York, is forced to leave the safety of his dorm and try to make his way across the country. His destination: California, where he hopes to find his father and best friend still alive. The journey is brutal. Zombies aren’t the only danger, here’s hunger, cold, loneliness, and the cruelty of other survivors. Along the way, Stiles meets Derek Hale, a gruff and guarded man who is also searching for his family. Together, they form a strong alliance, fighting side by side through the devastation. As the world around them falls apart, the two discover something stronger than fear and loss: the growing connection between them. Amid the pain, the possibility of something unexpected begins to emerge... maybe even love.

entry.title: if i love you less, will you love me more?
entry.summary:
Author: sumsie

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,708Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 19

Summary: After the worst year Beacon Hills has seen, Stiles Stilinski survives by staying useful. He helps on hunts and works nights at the sheriff’s station. Derek Hale lives on the edge of town and further from everyone else. He fights because it is easier than grieving. When Stiles becomes a constant presence, Derek allows it, not out of kindness but because Stiles understands violence and silence too well. Derek offers protection without comfort. Stiles offers devotion without limits. What grows between them is intense and unbalanced. Their bond is forged in blood and aftermath. As threats close in, Stiles begins to lose himself in Derek’s shadow, learning that survival is not the same as being cared for.

entry.title: Yellow Paper Daisy
entry.summary:
Author: Babysterek

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,044Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 56

Summary: “Well,” Peter says at last, forcing a crooked smile into his voice, “at least this time he didn’t almost get us all killed.”Derek swallows. His throat is dry, the words scraping on the way out. “I was drunk.” They land and disappear without effect. Talia turns then, her gaze settling on him fully. It’s steady, unreadable, and it makes his shoulders tense despite himself. “You were careless,” she says. Not angry. Not loud. Certain. “You are a werewolf, and if you got drunk, you laced it with wolfsbane, you did it. Do you understand, In twenty-four years, every scandal has had the same root. You. At some point, it stops being bad luck and becomes character. And I am tired of pretending this is something that merely happens to you.” Derek nods once, reflexive. “When you speak,” Talia continues, “you do so as a Hale. As Alpha blood. Your indulgences do not absolve you of that.” ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Derek just wanted a moment of quiet. Instead, he crosses a line with the last person he should trust.....old grudges, bad decisions, and a mistake he keeps repeating.

entry.title: The Butterfly Effect
entry.summary:
Author: Hockey_Lover31

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,174Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 145

Summary: The Butterfly Effect: The idea that small changes in initial conditions can lead to vastly different outcomes in complex, dynamic systems. What happens when Harry Potter, a small four year old whose selectively mute and determined to be highly autistic, is found by Sheriff Noah Stilinski one night, three years before the events of Season 1. If just one flap of a butterfly wing can cause a tornado, what can a Reincarnated Master of Death who longs for a family and will protect them no matter the cost, as much as his mind and body can handle, stumble upon a world filled with were-creatures, hunters, and a feral werewolf whose family and bonds were burned? Well, he might just have to protect his older brother, who threw himself and his best friend Scott into a world he didn't understand. And if along the way they happen to adopt a whole bunch of werewolves, a werecoyate, and a kitsune, well, he supposes his family just got a bit bigger.
